title: Blox Fruits: How to Obtain Every Fighting Style (2024 Guide)

steps.title: There are 12 fighting styles in Blox Fruits.
steps.content: There are 12 fighting styles in Blox Fruits. Fighting styles are one of four ways to deal damage in Blox Fruits. The other three ways are Blox Fruits, swords, and guns. [1] X Research source

steps.title: By default, every player knows the Combat fighting style.
steps.content: By default, every player knows the Combat fighting style. However, once you learn a new fighting style, Combat will be overwritten and you can't relearn it. Other fighting styles can be relearned for free.

steps.title: Fighting styles focus on utility over damage.
steps.content: Fighting styles focus on utility over damage. Most fighting styles have three moves, compared to Blox Fruits which have four to five, and swords and guns which have two.

steps.title: Godhuman, Sanguine Art, and Dragon Talon are the best fighting styles.
steps.content: Godhuman, Sanguine Art, and Dragon Talon are the best fighting styles. These styles are all learned in the Third Sea, but are incredibly powerful and useful later in the game. Godhuman is great for PvP since it does a lot of damage and inflicts stun. Sanguine Art is an all-rounder style that does a lot of damage and breaks instinct. It also has ranged click attacks, making it great for grinding, especially when paired with Buddha. However, it is by far the most difficult fighting style to unlock. Dragon Talon is good for grinding since it has AoE skills with big hitboxes. However, it does have extremely high knockback compared to Sharkman Karate or Sanguine Art.

steps.title: Combat
steps.content: Combat Obtainment: Default Description: The fighting style you start out with when you join the game. It's the weakest fighting style, so switching to another fighting style is recommended.

steps.title: Dark Step
steps.content: Dark Step Obtainment: Learned for $150,000 from the Dark Step Teacher Dark Step Teacher locations: Pirate Village (First Sea), Hot and Cold (Second Sea), Castle on the Sea (Third Sea) Description: Dark Step is required to learn Superhuman, Godhuman, and Death Step. It's a good choice for First Sea farming because it's cheap and has higher damage than Combat.

steps.title: Electric
steps.content: Electric Obtainment: Learned for $500,000 from the Mad Scientist Mad Scientist locations: below Skylands (First Sea), Hot and Cold (Second Sea), Castle on the Sea (Third Sea) Description: Electric is required to learn Superhuman, Godhuman, and Electric Claw. Electric is a good choice for beginners, and all of its abilities can damage Sea Beasts.

steps.title: Water Kung Fu
steps.content: Water Kung Fu Obtainment: Learned for $750,000 from the Water Kung Fu Teacher Water Kung Fu Teacher locations: Underwater City (First Sea), Hot and Cold (Second Sea), Castle on the Sea (Third Sea) Description: Water Kung Fu is required to learn Superhuman, Godhuman, and Sharkman Karate. Despite being expensive, it's a good choice for the First Sea since it does high damage and has a low attack cooldown.

steps.title: Dragon Breath
steps.content: Dragon Breath Obtainment: Learned for 1,500 Fragments from Sabi Sabi locations: Kingdom of Rose (Second Sea), Castle on the Sea (Third Sea) Description: Dragon Breath is required to learn Superhuman, Godhuman, and Dragon Talon. It's a very cheap fighting style and has good damage and range. However, it has slower attacks than most other fighting styles.

steps.title: Superhuman
steps.content: Superhuman Obtainment: Learned for $3,000,000 from the Martial Arts Master; must have 300+ Mastery in Dark Step, Electric, Water Kung Fu, and Dragon Breath Martial Arts Master locations: Snow Mountain(Second Sea, in a cave), Castle on the Sea (Third Sea) Description: Superhuman is required to get Godhuman. It does decent damage and has a good knockback, but takes a lot of time and effort to unlock.

steps.title: Death Step
steps.content: Death Step Obtainment: Learned for $2,500,000 and 5,000 Fragments from Phoeyu, the Reformed; must have 400+ Mastery in Dark Step and a Library Key (required to enter the room where Phoeyu is found) Phoeyu, the Reformed locations: Ice Castle (Second Sea), Castle on the Sea (Third Sea) Description: Death Step is required to get Godhuman. It works well in combos and is good for PvP and bounty hunting. It can be hard to get, however, since Dark Step mastery can be difficult to obtain.

steps.title: Sharkman Karate
steps.content: Sharkman Karate Obtainment: Learned for $2,500,000 and 5,000 Fragments from Daigrock, the Sharkman; must have given Daigrock a Water Key (dropped by the Tide Keeper boss) before purchasing. Daigrock, the Sharkman locations: Forgotten Island (Second Sea), Castle on the Sea (Third Sea) Description: Sharkman Karate is required to learn Godhuman. It is great for grinding, especially with the Buddha Fruit, and does a lot of damage. However, only one move can break instinct.

steps.title: Electric Claw
steps.content: Electric Claw Obtainment: Learned for $3,000,000 and 5,000 Fragments from Previous Hero; must complete Previous Hero's quest and have 400+ Mastery in Electric Previous Hero location: Floating Turtle Description: Electric Claw is required to learn Godhuman. It is very mobile and does a lot of damage, but can be difficult to get due to high Electric mastery requirements.

steps.title: Dragon Talon
steps.content: Dragon Talon Obtainment: Learned for $3,000,000 and 5,000 Fragments from Uzoth; must have 400+ Mastery in Dragon Breath and give a Fire Essence to Uzoth (obtained from the Death King at Haunted Castle) Uzoth location: Hydra Island in the Dragon Dojo Description: Dragon Talon is required to get Godhuman and the Dojo Belts. It is easy to aim and does a lot of damage, but it can be hard to obtain and has high mastery requirements.

steps.title: Godhuman
steps.content: Godhuman Obtainment: Learned for $5,000,000, 5,000 Fragments, 10 Dragon Scales , 20 Fish Tails, 10 Mystic Droplets, and 20 Magma Ores from Ancient Monk; must have 400+ Mastery in Superhuman, Death Step, Sharkman Karate, Electric Claw, and Dragon Talon Ancient Monk location: Floating Turtle inside a large tree Description: Godhuman is great for PvP as it does a lot of damage and stuns, but unlocking it is tedious.

steps.title: Sanguine Art
steps.content: Sanguine Art Obtainment: Learned for $5,000,000 and 5,000 Fragments from Shafi; must first give a Leviathan Heart , 20 Demonic Wisps, 20 Vampire Fangs, and 2 Dark Fragments to Shafi. Shafi location: Tiki Outpost Description: Works great for grinding, raids, and Sea Events, but is very time-consuming to get since the player needs to get a Leviathan Heart.
